example.description: This example shows radio buttons with an explicit group set.
example.source: <a:table columns="100, 150" cellheight="20"> <a:label>Options</a:label> <a:label>Choices</a:label> <a:radiobutton group="g2">Option 1</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton group="g3">Choice 1</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton group="g2">Option 2</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton group="g3">Choice 2</a:radiobutton> </a:table>

example.description: First option is checked as default, third is disabled.
example.source: <a:table columns="140" cellheight="20"> <a:label>Choose Your favourite car:</a:label> <a:radiobutton group = "g4" label = "Audi A6" checked = "true" tooltip = "RS6 is the best :)"></a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton group = "g4" label = "Audi A4" tooltip = "Nicee"></a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton group = "g4" label = "Volvo" tooltip = "Not bad" disabled = "true"></a:radiobutton> </a:table>
